453240.name: RPG Maker MV - Add-on Vol.2: RM2K Hero Character Pack
453240.description:
The product name Season Pass Vol.2 has been changed to Add-on Vol.2.
NOTE: The contents included will not change.

Disclaimer: Maps are not included in the DLC Pack. They're for showcasing materials.
Please note: This pack is included in the RPG Maker MV Season Pass.

The 2nd pack includes some characters from RPG Maker 2000/2003 RTP completely remade for RPG Maker MV. Alex’s party is back to help you create your dream game!

Includes the following materials:

  • Character Walking Graphics + Damage Poses
  • Sideview Graphics
  • Facesets (MV Style and Rm2k Style) + 4 Basic Emotions
  • Remastered RM2k Bust Art from the Original RTP
453240.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语
